ResumeParserData.SkillBlock: Sheet Metal Fabrication : Proficient in cutting, bending, shaping, and assembling sheet metal components for various applications.  Technical Drawing Interpretation : Skilled in reading and interpreting blueprints and technical drawings to determine project specifications.  Machinery Operation : Experienced in operating CNC punch presses, laser cutters, press brakes, and other metalworking machinery.  Welding and Assembly : Competent in welding, bolting, and riveting techniques to assemble metal parts.  Quality Control : Strong attention to detail in conducting quality control inspections to ensure finished products meet industry standards.  Project Management : Ability to manage multiple projects efficiently, ensuring timely completion and adherence to specifications.  Safety Compliance : Knowledgeable about workplace safety standards and committed to maintaining a safe working environment.  Team Leadership : Experienced in training and mentoring junior sheet metal workers, fostering a collaborative and productive team environment.

ResumeParserData.Experience: ABC Fabrication Ltd Senior Sheet Metal Worker  Manchester, UK  2018 - Present  Leading a team of sheet metal workers in the fabrication and assembly of metal components for industrial and commercial projects. Responsible for ensuring high-quality production, adherence to safety standards, and efficient project management.  Key Responsibilities :   Interpreting blueprints and technical drawings to determine material requirements and project specifications.  Operating machinery such as CNC punch presses, laser cutters, and press brakes to cut, bend, and shape metal.  Assembling and welding metal parts to create finished products according to design specifications.  Conducting quality control inspections to ensure finished products meet industry standards and client expectations.  Training and mentoring junior sheet metal workers, providing guidance on best practices and safety procedures.  Collaborating with project managers and engineers to develop efficient fabrication processes.  Maintaining equipment and performing routine maintenance to ensure optimal performance and longevity.  XYZ Metalworks Sheet Metal Worker  Manchester, UK  2015 - 2018  Worked on various projects involving the fabrication, assembly, and installation of sheet metal components. Developed expertise in handling different types of metals and operating various fabrication tools and machinery.  Key Responsibilities :   Reading and interpreting blueprints and technical drawings to determine project requirements.  Measuring and cutting metal sheets to specified dimensions using hand tools and machinery.  Bending and shaping metal components using brake presses and other equipment.  Assembling metal parts using welding, bolting, and riveting techniques.  Performing quality checks to ensure finished products meet design specifications and quality standards.  Adhering to safety protocols and maintaining a clean and organized work environment.  Assisting in the maintenance and repair of fabrication equipment.  DEF Manufacturing Apprentice Sheet Metal Worker  Manchester, UK  2013 - 2015  Gained hands-on experience in sheet metal fabrication through an apprenticeship program. Learned the fundamentals of metalworking, including cutting, shaping, and assembling metal components.  Key Contributions :   Assisted senior sheet metal workers in various fabrication tasks.  Learned to operate basic metalworking machinery and tools.  Developed skills in reading and interpreting technical drawings.  Participated in safety training sessions and adhered to workplace safety standards.  Gained experience in different welding techniques and metal finishing processes.

JobProfile.Title: Senior Sheet Metal Worker
JobProfile.Alias: sheet metal former, sheet metal roofer, metal worker, sheet worker, sheet metal stamping worker, sheet metal pattern cutter, sheet metal workers, sheet metal labourer, industrial sheet metal worker, cornice maker, sheet metal operator, metalworker, sheet metal welder, sheet metal cutter, sheet metal journeyman, sheet metal lay out worker, sheet metal installer

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Leading a team of sheet metal workers in the fabrication and assembly of metal components for industrial and commercial projects. Responsible for ensuring high-quality production, adherence to safety standards, and efficient project management. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Interpreting blueprints and technical drawings to determine material requirements and project specifications. 
 Operating machinery such as CNC punch presses, laser cutters, and press brakes to cut, bend, and shape metal. 
 Assembling and welding metal parts to create finished products according to design specifications. 
 Conducting quality control inspections to ensure finished products meet industry standards and client expectations.

JobProfile.Title: Sheet Metal Worker
JobProfile.Alias: sheet metal former, sheet metal roofer, metal worker, sheet worker, sheet metal stamping worker, sheet metal pattern cutter, sheet metal workers, sheet metal labourer, industrial sheet metal worker, cornice maker, sheet metal operator, metalworker, sheet metal welder, sheet metal cutter, sheet metal journeyman, sheet metal lay out worker, sheet metal installer

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Worked on various projects involving the fabrication, assembly, and installation of sheet metal components. Developed expertise in handling different types of metals and operating various fabrication tools and machinery. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Reading and interpreting blueprints and technical drawings to determine project requirements. 
 Measuring and cutting metal sheets to specified dimensions using hand tools and machinery. 
 Bending and shaping metal components using brake presses and other equipment. 
 Assembling metal parts using welding, bolting, and riveting techniques. 
 Performing quality checks to ensure finished products meet design specifications and quality standards. 
 Adhering to safety protocols and maintaining a clean and organized work environment. 
 Assisting in the maintenance and repair of fabrication equipment.

JobProfile.Title: Apprentice Sheet Metal Worker
JobProfile.Alias: sheet metal worker apprentice, sheet metal apprentice

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Gained hands-on experience in sheet metal fabrication through an apprenticeship program. Learned the fundamentals of metalworking, including cutting, shaping, and assembling metal components. 
 Key Contributions : 
 Assisted senior sheet metal workers in various fabrication tasks. 
 Learned to operate basic metalworking machinery and tools. 
 Developed skills in reading and interpreting technical drawings. 
 Participated in safety training sessions and adhered to workplace safety standards. 
 Gained experience in different welding techniques and metal finishing processes.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Experienced Sheet Metal Worker with 8 years in the metal fabrication industry. Proficient in cutting, shaping, and assembling sheet metal for various applications. Demonstrates strong technical skills, attention to detail, and a commitment to producing high-quality work. Known for adhering to safety standards and efficiently managing multiple projects.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: James has an experience in the domain of 'Construction', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Sheet Metal Workers. The candidate has been working as a Senior Sheet Metal Worker at ABC Fabrication Ltd for the last 6.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary: James doesn't have any management level experience in the resume.

Professional Summary : 
Experienced Sheet Metal Worker with 8 years in the metal fabrication industry. Proficient in cutting, shaping, and assembling sheet metal for various applications. Demonstrates strong technical skills, attention to detail, and a commitment to producing high-quality work. Known for adhering to safety standards and efficiently managing multiple projects.

Education : 
Manchester Technical College
Diploma in Fabrication and Welding Technology
Graduated : 2015
Manchester High School
GCSEs : Mathematics, English, Design and Technology
Completed : 2013

Professional Experience : 
ABC Fabrication Ltd Senior Sheet Metal Worker
Manchester, UK
2018 - Present
Leading a team of sheet metal workers in the fabrication and assembly of metal components for industrial and commercial projects. Responsible for ensuring high-quality production, adherence to safety standards, and efficient project management.
Key Responsibilities : 
Interpreting blueprints and technical drawings to determine material requirements and project specifications.
Operating machinery such as CNC punch presses, laser cutters, and press brakes to cut, bend, and shape metal.
Assembling and welding metal parts to create finished products according to design specifications.
Conducting quality control inspections to ensure finished products meet industry standards and client expectations.
Training and mentoring junior sheet metal workers, providing guidance on best practices and safety procedures.
Collaborating with project managers and engineers to develop efficient fabrication processes.
Maintaining equipment and performing routine maintenance to ensure optimal performance and longevity.
XYZ Metalworks Sheet Metal Worker
Manchester, UK
2015 - 2018
Worked on various projects involving the fabrication, assembly, and installation of sheet metal components. Developed expertise in handling different types of metals and operating various fabrication tools and machinery.
Key Responsibilities : 
Reading and interpreting blueprints and technical drawings to determine project requirements.
Measuring and cutting metal sheets to specified dimensions using hand tools and machinery.
Bending and shaping metal components using brake presses and other equipment.
Assembling metal parts using welding, bolting, and riveting techniques.
Performing quality checks to ensure finished products meet design specifications and quality standards.
Adhering to safety protocols and maintaining a clean and organized work environment.
Assisting in the maintenance and repair of fabrication equipment.
DEF Manufacturing Apprentice Sheet Metal Worker
Manchester, UK
2013 - 2015
Gained hands-on experience in sheet metal fabrication through an apprenticeship program. Learned the fundamentals of metalworking, including cutting, shaping, and assembling metal components.
Key Contributions : 
Assisted senior sheet metal workers in various fabrication tasks.
Learned to operate basic metalworking machinery and tools.
Developed skills in reading and interpreting technical drawings.
Participated in safety training sessions and adhered to workplace safety standards.
Gained experience in different welding techniques and metal finishing processes.

Skills : 
Sheet Metal Fabrication : Proficient in cutting, bending, shaping, and assembling sheet metal components for various applications.
Technical Drawing Interpretation : Skilled in reading and interpreting blueprints and technical drawings to determine project specifications.
Machinery Operation : Experienced in operating CNC punch presses, laser cutters, press brakes, and other metalworking machinery.
Welding and Assembly : Competent in welding, bolting, and riveting techniques to assemble metal parts.
Quality Control : Strong attention to detail in conducting quality control inspections to ensure finished products meet industry standards.
Project Management : Ability to manage multiple projects efficiently, ensuring timely completion and adherence to specifications.
Safety Compliance : Knowledgeable about workplace safety standards and committed to maintaining a safe working environment.
Team Leadership : Experienced in training and mentoring junior sheet metal workers, fostering a collaborative and productive team environment.

Certifications : 
City & Guilds Level 3 Diploma in Fabrication and Welding
Certified Welder (MIG, TIG) 
First Aid at Work Certification
Health and Safety in the Workplace Certification
